price: “Sihrii isaatiin dachii keessan irraa isin baasuu fedhaa, isin immoo maalitti na ajajju” (jedhe).
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُم بِسِحۡرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum bisiḥ'rihi famādhā tamurūna
